title: How Zero Down Lease is taking the fear out of leasehold extensions
authors: Caroline Bray, HM Land Registry Geovation Stakeholder Manager

content.text: Zero Down Lease took part in the Geovation Accelerator Programme in 2022. The programme is co-sponsored by HM Land Registry and Ordnance Survey and supports start-ups in the geospatial and property sectors.
Want to know how a PropTech (property technology) company can transform lease extensions from costly and confusing to simple and affordable while maintaining a five-star average on Trustpilot?

In our latest podcast, I speak to Josef Wasinski, Chief Executive Officer and founder of Zero Down Lease, a company dedicated to helping customers navigate the complex area of lease extensions, taking away the fear and confusion.

Josef explains why he set up Zero Down Lease, the range of datasets they use, including HM Land Registry’s leasehold data, and the difference that taking part in the Geovation Accelerator Programme made in forming his company.
Listen to the podcast on Podbean or on YouTube.
